title: How to vacuum a pool with a sand filter - Quora

response.answer_text: when vacuuming with a sand filter, the choice of settings depends upon the amount of dirt or other contamination in the pool. Routine levels of particulates in a residential pool with a typical bather load can usually be vacuumed with the multiport valve turned to the Filter setting.

You follow the filter manufacturer’s instructions. Some allow backwashing to clear the filter, and some require that the filter be put in bypass, just ejecting the muck without going through the filter.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Saima Binte Saiful
